Academic Interests

  • Magnetospheric substorms
    • Inversion model for Substorm current wedge (SCW)
    • Substorm onsets
    • Solarwind-magnetosphere-ionosphere coupling
    • Configuration and generation mechnisms of substorm current wedge
  • Steve (Strong Thermal Emission Velocity Enhancement)
    • Magnetospheric driver of STEVE
    • Morphological Characteristics of STEVE
  • Machine learning for science discovery
    • Electron fluxes in Earth's Radiation belts
    • Electromagnetic waves in Earth's radiation belt
    • Coupled model of machine learning models and numerical simulations for radiation belt dynamics
  • Cold plasma in Earth's plasmasphere
    • Electron density and Cold ion densities in the inner magneotsphere
    • Erosion and refilling of the plasmasphere
    • Coupled model of machine learning models and numerical simulations for plasmaspheric dynamics
    • Mission design for Earth's plasmasphere
